reviews.customers_say: Customers find this summer dress comfortable for hot days and appreciate its nice material that's not thin, with one noting it's breathable. They like its style, describing it as a pretty summer dress for hot days, and value its versatility, being able to dress up or down. The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, with one mentioning it's fitted below the breast, and customers particularly appreciate the pockets. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and stylish
items.body: These dresses are amazing! Iâ€™ve bought three and considering more. Theyâ€™re flowing, extremely comfortable material, well made, great designs, perfect length and compliments oneâ€™s figure nicely. Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€, 135 lbs and normally wouldnâ€™t wear a dress shaped as these but they fit great and I get lots of compliments on them! I took a medium, concerned theyâ€™d be too tight around my butt. But they fit well and the L was way too big. Read more
items.author: May

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite summer dress
items.body: This dress is my go to dress this summer. It fits so nice. Itâ€™s light weight material yet not translucent. The color hasnâ€™t faded, the seams are intact and the fabric soft and comfy. The pockets are perfect, length good, fit nice. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Summer dress
items.body: Love the dress. The material is good, light weight and flows well. The arm holes are not too big or too small. I like the pockets as well and they are hidden very well. Iâ€™m 5.2 and the dress sits right above my knee. Itâ€™s a nice summer dress. Itâ€™s a bit loose on me at the waist hence the 4 stars but overall like the print and might get more of these dresses. Read more
items.author: Ashwini Marawar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and they have pockets.
items.body: I bought four of these dresses. For $12.99 how can you beat the price. I figured it they didn't fit as a dress I would use them as beach cover ups. The yellow one I purchased is a bit smaller than the other three. In fact it had been returned and was not in a sealed bag. It fit me fine but someone had returned it. They don't wrinkle and are perfect for traveling. Read more
items.author: TAB 5644

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short-girl friendly and flattering!
items.body: I'm always on the hunt for a casual throw-on dress for spring and summer, and this one does not disappoint. Itâ€™s made of polyester, which I donâ€™t always prefer, but it really works for this style. The fabric is breathable and loose, yet still manages to hug my shape in a flattering way. At 5'1", I often struggle to find dresses that arenâ€™t too long or overwhelming, but this one hits just right. I went with a size large since Iâ€™m larger-chested, and the fit is perfect. Itâ€™s only minimally see-through, so I just wear shorts underneath and Iâ€™m good to go. The colors are beautiful and true to the picturesâ€”but the best part? It has pockets! Iâ€™ve already bought a second color and plan to grab more! Read more
items.author: Sweet Tee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Pockets
items.body: Material is very soft & comfortable to wear during hot summer days. The sizes run true. Wash dry and wear. Great dress for beachy vacations or cruises. It has pockets! Read more

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Boho Print, Floral-01, Navy Print, Floral-02, Blue Print, Black Floral, Floral-05, Floral-03, Floral-04, Orange Tropical Print, Navy Tropical Print, 03-red White, Aqua Floral, Solid Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
